https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dWv1Id8O67f9c2lZGPNyfRi8jip.jpg The short film tells the story of Alice and Adélia, who live together in an apartment in front of Elevado Costa e Silva, where they raised their daughter from Adélia's first marriage. With Adélia's death, Stella and Alice have to deal with grief and the memories of their long-lasting love affair. Cinco Minutos
